body_html:
It looks like forward hooks dont allow return values.
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L263-L265

However, changing the data attribute (as you have done) should work. Is it not working??
body_text:
It looks like forward hooks dont allow return values.
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L263-L265
However, changing the data attribute (as you have done) should work. Is it not working??
body:
It looks like forward hooks dont allow return values.
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L263-L265

However, changing the data attribute (as you have done) should work. Is it not working??
